text.4_Chapter, 18_Verse: Its like running from a lion and bumping into a bear then leaning on the wall and being bitten by a snake
text.6_Chapter, 10_Verse: Amos is saying that you'll die by the sword and Jews will be exiled
text.7_Chapter, 3_Verse: All you try to do is be mean to poor people
text.6_Chapter, 9_Verse: Amaziah the priest: Send a message to Jeroboam saying "Amos is rebelling against you"
text.7_Chapter, 2_Verse: Singing will be replaced with wailing, when they bury the corpses they'll be quiet
text.8_Chapter, 5_Verse: Hashem who is mighty in heaven and His creations are on Earth
text.6_Chapter, 16_Verse: Your wife will cheat on you, your children will die and you'll die in exile
text.0_Chapter, 10_Verse: 4th sin of Edom. The never-ending hatred of the Jews.
text.6_Chapter, 1_Verse: Amos: Forgive the Jews, they're small
text.6_Chapter, 15_Verse: You told me not be a Prophet
text.0_Chapter, 6_Verse: I (Hashem) will send a fire to Gaza
text.4_Chapter, 26_Verse: And go to exile to Demascus
text.0_Chapter, 3_Verse: I (Hashem) will send a fire to the palaces
text.1_Chapter, 13_Verse: Fast people: no escape. Strong people: won't save themselves.
text.8_Chapter, 1_Verse: If you go down to the grave then I will take you from there. If you go to heaven I'll bring you down.
text.1_Chapter, 5_Verse: Israel is over the line. They sell righteous people for money and poor people for shoes.
text.2_Chapter, 6_Verse: If Hashem does something He tells the prophets first
text.0_Chapter, 5_Verse: 4th sin of Gaza was that they did not let the Jews escape from Edom. Hashem does not forgive them.
text.4_Chapter, 21_Verse: Bring your offerings – I don't care!
text.0_Chapter, 1_Verse: Hashed calls out from Zion. Everything will dry up.
text.6_Chapter, 7_Verse: Hashem: I'm putting down a line for the Jews
text.8_Chapter, 2_Verse: If you go into the depths I'll have a snake bite you
text.1_Chapter, 10_Verse: I made your kids into prophets and Nazarites
text.7_Chapter, 6_Verse: Hashem "You think I forgot? BIG MISTAKE!
text.7_Chapter, 4_Verse: When will people enter my shop so I can rip them off
text.1_Chapter, 4_Verse: Pyro trick: Hashem says he'll burn everyone
text.7_Chapter, 1_Verse: The end has come (play on words of קץ?)
text.0_Chapter, 4_Verse: I will break the strength of Aram and send them into exile
text.4_Chapter, 17_Verse: You all say that you want the day of Hashem? You can't handle the day of Hashem
text.2_Chapter, 0_Verse: Here's a message for the Jewish people on how I took them out of Egypt
text.6_Chapter, 13_Verse: Amos says, "I'm not a prophet, not the son of a prophet, I'm a hick with straw in my teeth"
text.6_Chapter, 6_Verse: Vision number 3: Hashem has a plumb line
text.2_Chapter, 5_Verse: Does a Shofar blow without people being scared? Do bad things happen without ה׳ doing it?
text.0_Chapter, 8_Verse: 4th sin of Tyre was not letting the Jews escape Edom. They remember the pact of the brothers.
text.7_Chapter, 0_Verse: He sees a basket of figs
text.6_Chapter, 0_Verse: Amos sees a vision: Locust eat the crops
text.7_Chapter, 11_Verse: People will search everywhere and not find the word of Hashem
text.2_Chapter, 11_Verse: When a shepherd find what's left of his sheep, ear feet, etc. That'll be you!
text.7_Chapter, 8_Verse: I will darken the day of light
text.2_Chapter, 7_Verse: If a lion roars who is not afraid? Hashem speaks how can you not prophesies?
text.1_Chapter, 0_Verse: 4th sin of Moab. They burned the king of Edom's bones.
text.2_Chapter, 1_Verse: You're My people so I expect standards
text.8_Chapter, 0_Verse: Amos sees Hashem on the Alter. Everything shakes. People die by the sword.
text.1_Chapter, 12_Verse: I will make you suffer like a wagon stuffers under its load
text.1_Chapter, 8_Verse: I (Hashem) destroyed the Emorites before you and they were really tough
text.4_Chapter, 24_Verse: Did you bring me offerings in the desert?
text.0_Chapter, 12_Verse: 4th sin of Ammon destroyed the child of Gilead
text.2_Chapter, 2_Verse: Do 2 people get together without arranging beforehand?
text.6_Chapter, 3_Verse: A ball of fire comes down and consumes everything
text.1_Chapter, 11_Verse: You gave the Nazarites win and told the prophets "We don't want to hear it"
text.8_Chapter, 3_Verse: My eye is on you all for bad
text.4_Chapter, 20_Verse: I (Hashem) hate your holidays (because they're fake)
text.0_Chapter, 2_Verse: 3 sins of Damascus. 4th is over the line. Plowed up Gilead.
text.6_Chapter, 11_Verse: Amaziah says to Amos: Go back to Judah, eat bread and give prophesies
text.6_Chapter, 8_Verse: Destroy houses of idolatry. Go after Jeroboam's house with a sword...
text.8_Chapter, 4_Verse: I'll rise like a tidal wave
text.1_Chapter, 3_Verse: Judah is over the line. They're disgusted with the Torah. Falsehood led them astray.
text.1_Chapter, 6_Verse: Desire, dust of earth, heads of poor people, man and dad sleep with same women ewww….
text.7_Chapter, 10_Verse: I (Hashem) will bring a famine not for food or water but for the word of Hashem
text.4_Chapter, 19_Verse: It's so dark, no light at all
text.7_Chapter, 7_Verse: Water should rise up and sweep you away
text.7_Chapter, 13_Verse: All of you who swear falsely will fall and never get up
text.2_Chapter, 4_Verse: Does a trap go up without catching something?
text.6_Chapter, 12_Verse: We don't want you here in the Kingdom of Israel! Go away!
text.0_Chapter, 0_Verse: Words of Amos. A farmer from Takoa. 2 years before the earthquake.
text.1_Chapter, 9_Verse: I took you out of Egypt and took care of you in the desert for 40 years
text.1_Chapter, 7_Verse: They have stolen clothing near their alter
text.2_Chapter, 3_Verse: Does a lion call out without catching prey?
text.7_Chapter, 9_Verse: I'll turn your holidays into mournings
text.6_Chapter, 14_Verse: Hashem took me from the sheep and told me to be a Prophet
